title: About Me
text:
ğŸ‘· This Page is Under Construction ğŸš§
Thanks for stopping by! Iâ€™m currently working on building this page. Please check back soon for updates.
I am recent MS graduate from the Department of Computer Science at Virginia Tech where I was advised by Anuj Karpatne in the Knowledge-Guided Machine Learning Lab. My research is in multiobjective optimization/multitask learning of physics-guided neural networks for applications in lake ecology and water quality modeling.
Prior to joining the MS program, I completed my Bachelorâ€™s in Computational Modeling and Data Analytics from Virginia Tech.
When Iâ€™m not working, I love to bike, travel and do photography (especially astrophotography ğŸŒŒğŸ”­).
